  Title:
Land anthropogenic carbon flux estimates

  Institution:
Global Carbon Project

  History:
2020-03-09: downloaded source from https://www.globalcarbonproject.org/carbonbudget/archive/2016/Global_Carbon_Budget_2016v1.0.xlsx 2020-03-09: converted to netCDF with https://github.com/rubisco-sfa/ILAMB-Data/blob/master/GCP/GCPtoNetCDF4.py
